1.「究極の一皿を 作ること……\n それは もはや 目標などではなく\n 心の底か:
"Creating the ultimate dish... It is no longer a
mere goalーbut something instinctiveー
something I seek from deep, deep within."

171.この姿になると お菓子作りに目覚め\nぺったんぺったん生地を こねるべく\n各地:
They apparently discovered their passion for
baking sweets, and began to lurk in front of
cutting boards, hoping to knead lots of dough.

252.この姿になると 野外で\n究極のカレーを食べるべく\n各所の野営地を 回るらしい:
They travel to various settlements around the
world, looking for the ultimate curry to eat
outdoors.

309.この姿になると 道路のわきで\n身体を クネクネさせながら\nヒッチハイクせずに:
They can't help but try to hitchhike on the side
of the road, their bodies wiggling about.

381.この姿になると 各地にいる\nご老人と のんびり\n語りあいたく なるらしい。:
They just want to relax and talk with old folks
who come from all over.

435.この姿になると 考古学に目覚め\n古い歴史を持つ遺跡に\n行きたくて たまらなく:
They have an irresistible urge to show interest
in archaeology and visit ancient historical
sites.

500.この姿になると お姫様気質となり\n安心安全な 場所から 優雅に\n海を見つめて:
They develop a princess-like temperament,
yearning to elegantly gaze at the sea from a safe
and secure spot.

571.この姿になると パカラパカラと前進し\nゾンビ系の魔物に 正々堂々と\n一騎打ち:
They want to boldly challenge monsters of the
undead variety to one-on-one combat.

645.この姿になると 雨に当たりたくなり\n常に雨天の地域を探すも そんな場所は\nな:
They love the feeling of rain, so they search for
places that are always raining. Since those don't
exist, they make do with bottoms of waterfalls.

732.いい感じのまな板は レンダーシアにある。\nそんなウワサを どこからか聞きつけ\:
They heard rumors that the perfect cutting board
can be found within Lendersia, and continue
their search for just the right one.

821.究極のカレーには レンダーシードを\n隠し味に使うとよいとの ウワサを信じ\nレ:
It's said that Lendersia Seeds contain a hidden
flavor to make the ultimate curry. Believing in
that rumor, they made their way to Lendersia.

901.ヒッチハイクは 日中にやるものだという\n信条からか だいたい 日が出ている時間:
Because of their creed that hitchhiking should be
done during the day, they usually show up in
Lendersia when the sun is up.

984.一脈 通じるものがあるのか もっぱら\n勇気の民のおじいちゃん のもとにばかり\:
They seem to have some kind of connection with
brave old men, as they find themselves often
visiting them.

1055.古い遺跡を求め 行きついた先は\n中央の 大きな大陸。\nそこで歴史ロマンを 肌:
While searching for old ruins, they came across a
vast central continent. There, they can
experience a historical romance firsthand.

1126.レンダーシアの海岸地帯で\n何を思って 海を見つめ続けるのか\nそれは彼女にしか:
Just what could she be thinking as she stares
endlessly into the seas of Lendersia?
Only she knows.

1197.レンダーシアには ゾンビ系の強者たちが\n集まるという 情報をもとに 各所を\n:
They travel Lendersia with their trusty steed,
Bomber, after hearing that it is home to some of
the world's strongest undead monsters.

1289.いい感じに 雨のような水しぶきを\n求めた結果 たどり着いたのは\nレンダーシア:
They say that in the pursuit of the perfect
rain-like spray of water, they ended up in
a remote part of Lendersia.

1361.「自分の やっていることこそが\n 真の モグラたたきなんだぞ！ っていう\n:
"I'm hammering away with everything I've got!
What I'm doing is the REAL whack-a-mole!"

1445.「今のところ いちばん しっくりくる のは\n パンがおいしい 村の家にある\n:
"So far, the one that's worked best for me is a
cutting board in a village where they make
delicious bread."

1520.「ワルドの香辛料に リャナのスープ\n ローヌの米俵……と思ったら\n なんだよ:
"Wald spices, Lyana soup, Rhone rice...or so I
thought. Seriously? It's just a bundle of hay!"

1598.「日光が 目にしみるから\n サングラスは はずせないのさ。\n ワイルドに の:
"I can't take my sunglasses off or else the sun
would fry my eyes. Gotta ride on wild, ya know!"

1660.「落ち着ける場所で のんびりと\n 熱いお茶を 飲みながらの語らいは\n えもい:
"There is something very special about chatting
over a cup of hot tea in a relaxing atmosphere."

1740.「街道の遺跡に 海岸の遺跡\n 文明の異なる ふたつのピラミッド。\n われの:
"Ruins of a highway, a ruined coast, two pyramids
of different civilizations... My thirst for
historical knowledge can never be quenched."

1814.「ああ いとしの おさかなさん。\n どうして あなたは そんなにおいしそうなの:
"Oh, my beloved little fish... Why do you look so
delicious? Please, won't you just come into my
stomach...?"

1903.「ハイヨ～ ボンバ～\n 目指すは内海の 中央にある島！\n 大丈夫！ お前なら:
"Alrighty, Bomber! We make our way to the island
in the middle of the inland sea! Don't worry! I
know you can cross the ocean just fine!"

1971.「あめ あめ ふれ ふれ みなさんが～♪\n みつけてくれて うれしいな～\n:
"Rain, rain, come on down ♪
I'm so glad that you've been found ♪
My gratitude just knows no bound ♪"

2303.「いつか スイの塔をピカピカに\n おそうじする夢がありまして そのための\n:
"My dream is to clean Sui Tower spotless one day.
I'm training myself to be capable enough to do
it."

2702.「あわよくば セクシーショットを……などとは\n みじんも思わず。ただ純粋に 美:
"Taking a sexy shot doesn't even cross my mind...
My intentions are simply to capture the beauty
and brilliance of the hairdresser in a photo."

2886.この姿になると 各領界にある\nほこらの ひんやりした場所に\nこもりたくなるら:
They prefer hiding in cool places, so the shrines
in each of the five realms are a perfect spot to
chill out.

2946.この姿になると ご飯に合いそうな\nおかずを 探すべく\n各領界の酒場に 出没す:
They frequent the taverns of each realm, seeking
out the perfect dishes to eat with rice.

3009.この姿になると それなりに安全な場所で\n人の形をしたものに 数学の個人授業を\:
Their mission is to give math tutoring lessons to
those who resemble humans in generally safe
places.

3098.この姿になると 肉をおいしく\n調理できる場所を 求めて\n各地の気に入った場所:
They travel around to their favorite places in
each region in search of a place where they can
cook their meat deliciously.

3166.この姿になると いつか大量の稲を刈り取るため\nまずは 高台から辺りをながめて:
They scout their surroundings from high up places
in order to find land that's suitable for growing
large amounts of rice.

3249.この姿になると 火の勢いが\n強くなりそうな場所に\n行きたくなるらしい。:
They yearn to find a place where fire burns
quite strongly.

3300.この姿になると 自身をキンキンに\n冷やせそうな 水場を求めて\nあちこちを さ:
They wander in search for a source of water
that's cold enough to give them the chill
they crave.

3366.この姿になると サーカスの興行で\n各領界の 過酷な場所を目指し そこの魔物たち:
For their circus acts, they seek out the harshest
areas of each realm, putting on a show for the
local monster population.

3450.冷たいクリームで できているため\n暑さが苦手で 炎の領界にだけは\n絶対に 行:
As they are made of cool cream, they do not like
hot places. Especially not the Fire Realm.

3519.水につかると フニャフニャになりそうなので\n水の領界にだけは 行かないでおこう:
They made the decision not to travel to the Water
Realm, as they'd soften up from all the water.

3597.燃えて 灰になってしまいそうなので\n炎の領界には 近づかないようにしようと\n:
They calculate their movements carefully, as
getting too close to the Fire Realm would burn
them to ashes.

3674.調理方法は 特殊な花の香りを つけてから\n高く寒い場所で カチコチに冷やし\n:
Their cooking method is to add a special floral
aroma to the meat, freeze it solid in an extremely
cold place, and then sear it in high heat.

3754.見る場所すべて 稲作には適さない土地で\nもういっそ 眼前に見えている でかい塔:
Every place they come across is not suitable for
growing rice, so they've even considered using
that big tower like some kind of greenhouse.

3847.結局のところ そんな条件を満たすのは\n炎の領界ぐらい だったらしく\n他の領界:
In the end, it seems that the Fire Realm is the
only realm where such a thing is possible.

3985.そもそも まともな水場なんて\n氷の領界と 水の領界ぐらいにしか無く\n他の領界:
To begin with, the only places with proper water
sources are the Ice and Water Realms. None of the
other realms come close.

4059.陰気な場所を好み とても丈夫な骨ゆえに\n炎熱などの環境変化にも 余裕で耐えられ:
They prefer gloomy places, and their strong bones
can withstand the elements and extreme heat. They
dislike sacred and very bright places, though.

4164.「氷の領界のほこらにある 氷柱は\n とても冷たくて いちばん居心地がいいね！\:
"The icicles in the Ice Realm's shrine are for
sure the most comfortable! But, the Storm
Realm's shrine is...so-so, I guess."

4264.「カーラモーラ村の酒場には おかずがない。\n みんなが飲んでいる あのお酒は:
"Carlamora's tavern has no side dishes. That
drink everyone likes must be made from rice.
It has to be, right?"

4360.この姿になると お風呂が大好きになり\nお風呂を求めて 五大陸の町のどこかに\n:
They love baths, and are said to appear somewhere
in the towns across the five continents,
slipping around to find a good soak.

4437.この姿になると 丸いこうらのように\n性格も丸くなり のんびりと\nおだやかな:
Like their shells, their personalities are well
rounded, becoming more relaxed and calm.

4508.この姿になると 料理がしたくて\nたまらなくなってしまい 思わず 五大陸の\nお:
They feel an overwhelming need to cook, and
unknowingly intrude the kitchens of castles
located across the five continents.

4591.この姿になると 美しい被写体を\n探さずには いられなくなり 被写体を求めて\n:
They can't help but look for beautiful subjects
for their photos. In their search for the perfect
one, their travels lead them to campsites.

4680.この姿になると 無性に色々なモノを\nたたきたくなってしまうそうだが\nたたかれ:
They have an inexplicable urge to hit everything
and everyone, but it doesn't really hurt all that
much.

4760.この姿になると 周囲を\nおそうじして ピカピカにしようという\n使命感が 芽生:
They develop a sense of duty to clean up their
surroundings and to make everything sparkle
and shine.

4825.「キミは なかなか賢そうな顔立ちをしているね。\n では 女神像くん よく聞きた:
"You've quite the intelligent look. Now, listen
to me, Goddess statue... How can I calculate the
volume of this church...?"

4914.「この肉の調理で 一番きついのは\n 間違いなく 影の谷で 花が咲くのを\n ひ:
"The most difficult part of cooking this meat is,
without a doubt, waiting patiently for the
flowers to bloom in the Vale of Shadow."

4992.この姿になると 心にも身体にも\nチカラがみなぎり 無性に\nすもうを とりたく:
Their mind and body become filled with energy,
and all they can think about is wanting to
practice sumo wrestling.

5057.「毒の大地に 全部海水 荒れた嵐の大地と\n いくらなんでも これはちょっと厳し:
"Poisonous lands, all seawater, rough and stormy
terrain...it's all just too harsh. But inside that
tower...maybe it could work?"

5152.この姿になると キレイな水が無いと\n生きられなくなるため キレイな水を求めて\:
They need clean water to survive, so they fly
from place to place seeking the very cleanest
they can find.

5227.「ここから見える 竜のシルエットは\n 今にも 動きはじめそうで\n 心が 燃え:
"That silhouette of a dragon off in the distance
looks like it could move at any moment...
It sets my heart ablaze with excitement!"

5299.素敵な お風呂があるのは\nきっと大きな国に 違いない。\nそんな思いで お風呂:
Any place with a nice bath must surely be an
impressive country. With that in mind, they
continue their soapy search.

5373.三度の食事より こうら干しが 好きなため\n自然と 太陽の出ている時間帯に\n姿:
Since they prefer to sun-dry their shell instead
of eating three meals a day, they naturally
appear during the daytime.

5441.作る料理のウデ前は 各国の料理長も\n認めるほどで 作る速度も通常の９倍にのぼり:
Their cooking skills are recognized by chefs from
all over, and they can cook with incredible
speedーnine times faster than normal!

5531.たどり着いたキャンプ地では 見習い美容師たちの\n美しさに心をうばわれ 彼女たち:
While at a campsite, they were so stricken by the
beauty of an apprentice hairdresser that they
solemnly vowed to make them their photo subjects.

5621.モグラの宿命的に 日光が目にしみるので\nもっぱら 夜から朝にかけて\n活動する:
As is the fate of moles, their eyes are sensitive
to sunlight, so they try to be active mainly from
night until morning.

5696.おそうじは 明るいうちからを信条に\nできるかぎり朝から おそうじ開始するよう\:
Although they try to get a really early morning
start on cleaning, sometimes they just can't
help but oversleep.

5783.「ツボから流れ出る 心地よい水が\n ワシのからだを キンキンに冷やしてくれる。:
"The soothing water flowing from the pot just
cools me right off... Ahhhh...
What a niiiiice river this is..."

5872.「ここは 清廉な空気と聖なる光にあふれている。\n お客は……モコフル達か。\n:
"This place is filled with pure air and a sacred
light. These visitors...they're Fluff Puffs. I
have to be careful, or I might get purified..."

5959.五大陸の各地にいる ライバルたちと\n日夜 一緒にケイコしたり おいしい ご飯を:
They deepen their bonds with their rivals across
the five continents by training together day and
night and by sharing delicious meals.

6049.「キレイナ水場ヲ求メテ イロイロ回ルウチ\n ウェナ諸島ニ 行キツイタノダ。\n:
"I traveled around looking for a beautiful place
with water, and ended up in the Wena Islands. I
just love beautiful places more than anything!"

6139.夜行性で キレイな水であれば 塩からい水でも\nイケるクチ。望みの水場を見つける:
They're nocturnal, and can live in saltwater so
long as it's clean. When they find a good spot,
they glow with happiness.

6231.「まだまだ ライバルたちには\n 全然かなわないけれど いつかは勝てるように\n:
"I may not be as good as my rivals yet, but I'll
keep doing my best so that I can beat 'em
someday!"

6318.「前略 メギストリスの都では どこを探しても\n お風呂が見つからず 悲しみにう:
"I couldn't find a bath anywhere in Megistris
City. I stared at the moat dejectedly, trembling
with sadness..." Sincerely, with Soap

6420.「この姿になると 自分が 恐竜なのか\n ムシなのか アイデンティティに悩むので:
"I often wonder if I'm a dinosaur, or an
insect... I struggle with my identity. Upon
deeper thought, I realize I'm just a Mimicker."

6583.この姿になると 野生の本能が\n枝で昼寝ができそうな 木を求めて \nあちこち:
Their wild instincts sent them flying from place
to place, hoping to find a tree whose branches
they can nap in.

6652.この姿になると 自分をおいしく\n焼いてくれそうな 火がある場所に\n行きたくな:
They seem to want to go to a fiery place that
would roast them quite deliciously.

6715.この姿になると 自分の\n甘さや みずみずしさと 比べるため\n魔界各地の 果物:
They set out on a journey to find fruits from all
over the Demon World, looking to compare
them to their own sweetness and juiciness.

6787.この姿になると 明るさの参考に\n人工の灯がある場所に ぴょんぴょん\n跳ねなが:
They supposedly appear and hop around in places
with artificial lighting, using them as a
reference for their own brightness.

6858.この姿になると 高い場所や\n気合が入っていそうだと 思うものの前に\n現れ に:
It's said that they appear in front of tall
places or places that require great focus, as
they glare down with an intimidating presence.

6930.この姿になると おいしいお茶を\nいれるのに適した 至高の水を求め\n各地の水場:
They supposedly visit different water sources
across various regions, hoping to find the
perfect water with which to make delicious tea.

6999.この姿になると 魔界の僻地\n人が 寄り付かないような場所で\nのっしりと たた:
They prefer to linger in remote areas of
the Demon Worldーplaces where no one
would dare approach.

7064.この姿になると 人目につかない\n暗がりに ひっそりと溶け込むため\n魔界の各所:
It wanders around various parts of the Demon
World, choosing to blend into dark places as
to remain undetected by others.

7135.木が生えていない 砂漠のような場所だと\n仕方なく 木の代わりに\nサボテンを:
In places like deserts that have no trees, they
have no choice but to act as cacti as a
substitute for them.

7201.基本的には 火があるところを\n求めるも どこにも見当たらないと\nなぜか仲間意:
Put simply, they search for fire. If they can't
find any, they yearn for some camaraderie
and make their way to food stalls.

7279.収穫された果物は もちろんのこと\n木になったように見える 果物っぽいものにも\:
Not only do harvested fruits captivate them,
but fruit-like objects on trees also pique
their curiosity.

7357.どうしても 人工の灯が \nついている状態を 見たいので\n出てくる時間は 夜が:
When lit, they yearn to see artificial
lighting, so they mainly come out during
nighttime when it's dark enough.

7426.気合が入っていそう だと思うものは\n度胸を試せそうな 乗り物だとか\n痛恨の一:
The things that seem super intense are those
that test your courageーlike taking a crazy ride
or something that'll give you a good whack.

7510.なんだかんだで 一番良いお茶が\nいれられそうな場所は\n狭間の世界 だったとい:
After all was said and done, it looks as if the
place best suited for brewing tea was the
World Between.

7569.あまりに 僻地すぎるのか\n本当に 人が寄り付かず さすがに\n滅んだ場所は無い:
It seems the location they chose was so remote
that no one bothered to come near. Maybe
choosing such a desolate place was a mistake...

7644.日光にあたるのが 大の苦手で\nできるだけ 夜の時間帯に\n光を避けて 出現する:
They hate being exposed to light, so they prefer
to appear at night and avoid light whenever
possible.

7706.「別に トラキーのキが\n 木っちゅう わけやないで。\n トラの本能的なもんや:
"The 'ky' in 'Tracky' isn't just some random
noise. It's supposed be the 'key' to something...
like a tiger's instinct. I dunno, though."

7775.「濃厚ソースに 酸味の効いたマヨ\n かつ節と 青のりをパラパラふって\n そう:
:Rich sauce, tangy mayo, sprinkled with fish
flakes and sea cabbage... Yes, this...
This is the ultimate...!"

7855.「すももも ももも もものうち。\n 魔界の果物 砂漠のものを除いて\n 全体的:
"Well, isn't this just peachy! Don't you think
all the fruits in the Demon World (except
the desert ones, blech!) have some nice color?"

7927.「やさしい光に 熱い光\n きらびやかな光に おごそかな光 \n ああ 光が 広:
"Gentle lights and scorching lights...
Brilliant lights and solemn lights...
Ah, light just spreads all over..."

7995.「へっ……へへっ 気合を入れりゃ\n 高いところで ぐるんぐるん振り回されようが:
"Heh... Heh, heh... As long as I stay focused,
even if I spin around in really high places,
then I should be able to... Urk..."

8078.「ルファの水は ええけど 他のは\n 独創的な お茶が たてられそうやね。\n:
"The water from Rufa is fine, but as for the
others...I suppose some unique teas could be
brewed from them. Please bear with me."

8147.「旅人の宿屋へ ようこそ。\n ふかふかの布団を 用意したぞ。\n ゆっくり 休:
"Welcome to the Traveler's Inn.
We've prepared a nice, fluffy bed for you.
Please enjoy your stay!"

8210.「サーチ アンド デストロイ。\n エネミー コンタクト。\n エラー……ノーウ:
"SEARCH AND DESTROY.
ENEMY CONTACT.
ERROR... NO WEAPON FOUND."

8430.白灰の試練場のどこか: Somewhere in the White Ash Trial

8478.深翠の試練場のどこか: Somewhere in the Deep Green Trial
